/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/sync.dir/sync.cpp.o  -o sync -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libYARP_math.so.2.3.66 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_dev.so.2.3.66 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_init.so.2.3.66 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_name.so.2.3.66 -lpthread /usr/local/lib/libYARP_sig.so.2.3.66 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_OS.so.2.3.66 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
